DOC.brief_summary: This randomised prospective study was designed to compare the convalescence and the long-term sequelae in inguinal hernia repair with either a bilayer mesh as devised by Gilbert (Prolene Hernia SystemÂ®) or an onlay mesh applied according to Lichtenstein.
DOC.brief_title: Lichtenstein Patch or Prolene Hernia System (PHS) for Inguinal Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: Uni or bilateral Primary or recurrent bodymass index over 40kg/m2, severe comorbidities
